source.title: Goutham Iyyappan - A CTO who can Maintain & Scale ...
source.snippet: A CTO who can Maintain & Scale Your Mobile Apps to 1M+ Users · Goutham is a passionate Entrepreneur who lives and breathes Mobile App Development.

pain_points: Performance issues leading to user drop-offs
buying_signals: Focus on maintaining and scaling mobile apps
leadInfo.pitch_angle: Leverage Goutham's expertise in mobile app development to enhance your app's performance and security, ensuring it remains competitive in a fast-evolving digital landscape.

About
About
Goutham is a passionate Entrepreneur who lives and breathes Mobile App Development. His passion towards building apps led him to start ThinkAlternate Technologies, fastest growing Mobile App development company in Bangalore, India. 
He is process driven and makes sure his clients always get the best in class products for their business, while primary focus being growth of his clients business.

He is a highly energetic leader who goes above and beyond for a product success. He has so far built more than 100+ Apps for customers in India, USA, UK, France, Japan, Gibraltar, Canada and various other countries across the globe. 

Goutham also guides and hand-hold startups by being their fractional-CTO. 

You will find him in his element when he’s talking about business, building mobile apps, swimming meditating, travelling and finally being himself with a good cup of coffee and a non-fictional read. 


ThinkAlternate Technologies

★ One of the fastest growing Mobile App Development Company known for executing complex projects.

★ Certified development team.

★ Process driven framework for timely delivery and lifelong support.

Our In-house product success team can help you build your dream product in lighting speed.

Services
Services
Ensuring Your Mobile App Stays Future-Ready

Your mobile app is not a one-time project—it’s an evolving digital asset that demands continuous optimization. In today’s tech landscape, even the smallest issues can lead to:

✔ Unexpected crashes impacting UX
✔ Performance slowdowns = customer drop-offs
✔ Security vulnerabilities putting data at risk
✔ Compliance with evolving App Store & Play Store policies

We specialize in strategic app maintenance that minimizes downtime, maximizes performance.

80% of Users Abandon Slow-Loading Apps…

App Load Time: Every Extra Second Costs You Customers and Revenue

A slow app isn’t just frustrating—it signals poor user experience, inefficient backend systems, and lost business opportunities. 
Performance bottlenecks, un-optimized code, and server issues could be silently driving users away.

The good news? This is fixable, without abandoning the app.
